A

ACTION_SECURE_ELEMENT_STATE_CHANGED - Static variable in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Broadcast Action: Intent to notify if the secure element state is changed.
android.se.omapi - package android.se.omapi
 

C

Channel - Class in android.se.omapi
Instances of this class represent an ISO/IEC 7816-4 channel opened to a Secure Element.
close() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Closes this channel to the Secure Element.
close() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Close the connection with the Secure Element.
closeChannels() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Close any channel opened on this session.
closeSessions() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Close all the sessions opened on this reader.

E

EXTRA_READER_NAME - Static variable in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Mandatory extra containing the reader name of the state changed secure element.
EXTRA_READER_STATE - Static variable in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Mandatory extra containing the connected state of the state changed secure element.

G

getATR() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Get the Answer to Reset of this Secure Element.
getName() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Return the name of this reader.
getReader() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Get the reader that provides this session.
getReaders() - Method in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Returns an array of available Secure Element readers.
getSelectResponse() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Returns the data as received from the application select command inclusively the status word received at applet selection.
getSEService() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Return the Secure Element service this reader is bound to.
getSession() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Get the session that has opened this channel.
getUiccReader(int) - Method in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Obtain a UICC Reader instance with specific slot number from the SecureElementService
getVersion() - Method in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Returns the version of the OpenMobile API specification this implementation is based on.

I

IO_ERROR - Static variable in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Error code used with ServiceSpecificException.
isBasicChannel() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Returns a boolean telling if this channel is the basic channel.
isClosed() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Tells if this session is closed.
isConnected() - Method in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Tells whether or not the service is connected.
isOpen() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Tells if this channel is open.
isSecureElementPresent() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Check if a Secure Element is present in this reader.

N

NO_SUCH_ELEMENT_ERROR - Static variable in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Error code used with ServiceSpecificException.

O

onConnected() - Method in interface android.se.omapi.SEService.OnConnectedListener
Called by the framework when the service is connected.
openBasicChannel(byte[]) - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
This method is provided to ease the development of mobile application and for compliancy with existing applications.
openBasicChannel(byte[], byte) - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Get an access to the basic channel, as defined in the ISO/IEC 7816-4 specification (the one that has number 0).
openLogicalChannel(byte[]) - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
This method is provided to ease the development of mobile application and for compliancy with existing applications.
openLogicalChannel(byte[], byte) - Method in class android.se.omapi.Session
Open a logical channel with the Secure Element, selecting the Applet represented by the given AID.
openSession() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Connects to a Secure Element in this reader.

R

Reader - Class in android.se.omapi
Instances of this class represent Secure Element Readers supported to this device.
reset() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Reader
Close all the sessions opened on this reader and reset the reader.

S

selectNext() - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Performs a selection of the next Applet on this channel that matches to the partial AID specified in the openBasicChannel(byte[] aid) or openLogicalChannel(byte[] aid) method.
SEService - Class in android.se.omapi
The SEService realises the communication to available Secure Elements on the device.
SEService(Context, Executor, SEService.OnConnectedListener) - Constructor for class android.se.omapi.SEService
Establishes a new connection that can be used to connect to all the Secure Elements available in the system.
SEService.OnConnectedListener - Interface in android.se.omapi
Interface to send call-backs to the application when the service is connected.
Session - Class in android.se.omapi
Instances of this class represent a connection session to one of the Secure Elements available on the device.
shutdown() - Method in class android.se.omapi.SEService
Releases all Secure Elements resources allocated by this SEService (including any binding to an underlying service).

T

transmit(byte[]) - Method in class android.se.omapi.Channel
Transmit an APDU command (as per ISO/IEC 7816-4) to the Secure Element.
